effect_entries.short_effect: Teaches Echoed Voice to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV & III: Snatch Gen II: Fury Cutter Gen I: Tri Attack)
effect_entries.effect: Teaches Snatch to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text_entries.text:
響く　声で　相手を　攻撃する。
毎ターン　だれかが　使い続けると
威力が　あがる。

The user attacks the target with an
echoing voice. If this move is used
every turn, it does greater damage.

Attacca il bersaglio con la propria voce
echeggiante. Se usata a ripetizione da uno
o più Pokémon il danno aumenta.

Quien lo usa se carga de energía y luego ataca.
Y, si ataca después del objetivo, dobla la
potencia del ataque.

Angriff mit widerhallender Stimme. Wird dieser
in jeder Runde von jemandem wiederholt, steigt
die Stärke.

Un cri retentissant blesse l’ennemi.
Si le lanceur ou d’autres Pokémon l’utilisent
à chaque tour, l’effet augmente.

목소리로 상대를 공격한다.
매 턴 누군가 기술을
계속해서 쓰면 위력이 올라간다.

こえで　あいてを　こうげきする。
まいターン　だれかが　つかうと
いりょくが　あがる。

The user attacks the target with an
echoing voice. If this move is used
every turn, it does greater damage.

The user attacks the target with an
echoing voice. If this move is used
every turn, it does greater damage.

Attaque l’ennemi avec la voix. Cette
attaque devient plus efficace si à
chaque tour quelqu’un l’utilise.

The user steals the effects of any
healing or status-changing move the
foe attempts to use.

The user steals the effects of any
healing or status-changing move the
foe attempts to use.

The user steals the effects of any
healing or status-changing move the
foe attempts to use.

Steals the effects
of the foe’s
healing or status-
changing move.

Steals the effects
of the move the foe
is trying to use.

of the move the foe
is trying to use.
